name: Daily Wife
description:
This is a computer desktop girlfriend, Can be placed on the computer desktop, The character's chest has a physical soft effect, Unlock more game content by improving character attributes !

Time system

There are four seasons of spring, summer, autumn and winter in the game, including rain and snow

Rich clothing content DLC

The game contains multiple pieces of clothing, and each part of each piece of clothing can be individually controlled

Custom color

The character’s hairstyle supports custom colors, and you can choose any color you like

Physical effect

The character's chest has a physical soft effect

Game features

A beautiful desktop girlfriend

5 character clothes DLC
2 character hairstyles
Custom hair color
More than 20 character poses
Free movement position
Free rotation angle
Free scaling size
